Package de.oth.blocklib.networking

Class NetworkManager

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.networking.NetworkManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientNetworkManager, ServerNetworkManager
public abstract class NetworkManager
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract base class for both ClientNetworkManager and ServerNetworkManager
Implements core features both NetworkManagers need.
Defines constants needed by both NetworkManagers.
Author:
Matthias Wagner

    Callback for receiving messages from the network.
